text: Wachusett Meadow Wildlife Sanctuary is a wildlife sanctuary located in Princeton, Massachusetts. The former farmstead includes a nature center, 12 miles of trails through woodlands, wetlands, and meadows, and a large pond with canoe rentals in season. ==Programs== Wachusett Meadow has an outdoor summer day camp, seasonal special events, and year-round educational programs for preschoolers to adults. ==See also== * List of nature centers in Massachusetts ==References== ==External links== * Category:Wildlife refuges in Massachusetts Category:Nature centers in Massachusetts Category:Princeton, Massachusetts Category:Protected areas of Worcester County, Massachusetts Category:Massachusetts Audubon Society Category:Museums in Worcester County, Massachusetts Category:Tourist attractions in Worcester County, Massachusetts
title: Wachusett Meadow Wildlife Sanctuary
